name: fs.mkdir-shim
description: Polyfill/shim for fs.mkdir in node versions < v10.12
author: Piotr Roszatycki <piotr.roszatycki@gmail.com>

scripts.postpublish: git tag v$npm_package_version -a -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git push --tags
scripts.pretest: eslint . && tsc --pretty -p . && tslint *.d.ts && npx prettier --ignore-path .gitignore --list-different '**/*.ts' '**/*.js' '**/*.json' '**/*.yml' && markdownlint *.md && es-shim-api --bound
